start: 🤖 Hello Admin! I'm your group management bot. Use /help for commands.
help:
📜 Commands:
/kick [reply/user] - Kick user
/ban [reply/user] - Ban user
/unban [user] - Unban
/mute [minutes] - Mute
/unmute - Unmute
/warn - Warn
/unwarn - Remove warn
/setlang [he/en] - Change language
/setlog [channel] - Set logs
/settings - Group settings
user_required: 🔍 Reply to a message or mention user!
